title: Banana and poppy seed loaf
ingredients: ['2 over-ripe bananas', '1 teaspoon cider vinegar', '1 pinch salt', '210g (350ml) plain flour', '1 1/2 teaspoons baking powder', '1 1/2 teaspoons vanilla sugar', '2 teaspoons poppy seeds', '100g butter or margarine, at room temperature', '150g (200ml) caster sugar', '2 eggs, at room temperature']
